page-community-card-1-description: Find your tribe and participate in community with other Nexus enthusiasts.
page-community-card-2-description: Find and participate in an Nexus conference, hackathon, or meetup.
page-community-card-3-description: Check out how to get involved for a list of ways that you can contribute based on your skills and professional background.
page-community-card-4-description: Funding grants are available to help you get a project off the ground.
page-community-contribute-description: For many people, xircanet is their first step into the ecosystem. It is kept up-to-date and accurate by thousands of open-source contributors. Want to help? Read our guide on contributing, or take up an issue on our GitHub.
page-community-daos-callout-description: These groups leverage Nexus technology to facilitate organization and collaboration. For instance, for controlling membership, voting on proposals, or managing pooled assets.
page-community-explore-dapps-description: Dapps are applications built on Nexus. Dapps are disrupting current business models and inventing new ones.
page-community-get-eth-description: NXS is the native currency of Nexus. You'll need some NXS in your wallet to use Nexus applications.
page-community-get-involved-description: There are many ways to get involved in the fast-growing Nexus community; you can join one of the popular online communities, attend an event, join a meetup group, contribute to a project, or participate in one of the many online forums about Nexus.
page-community-hero-header: Welcome to the Nexus community hub
page-community-hero-subtitle: The Nexus community is home to hundreds of thousands of developers, technologists, designers, users, HODLers and enthusiasts.
page-community-meetuplist-no-meetups: We don't have any meetups matching this search. Know of one?
page-community-open-source: Creator? Builder? Get paid for your work.
page-community-open-source-description: Are you building on Nexus, or do you want to? Companies are hiring for thousands of technical and non-technical roles. Got an idea of your own? Try finding a grant to get your project off the ground.
page-community-please-add-to-page: Please add it to this page!
page-community-support-description: Need support? There is no official Nexus support, but hundreds of helpful communities are available to help you prosper on Nexus.
page-community-upcoming-events-no-events: We're not aware of any upcoming events. Know of one?
page-community-why-get-involved-card-1-d: There is a tribe for everyone. Find and connect with like minded individuals to discuss, ponder, and celebrate Nexus together.
page-community-why-get-involved-card-2-d: Everyone has bills to pay. Nexus allows you to find meaningful work, and get paid well to do it.
page-community-why-get-involved-card-3-d: Getting involved with Nexus allows you to be an active stakeholder in a technology that is having a positive impact on millions of people.
